trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The mount researcher requires some assistance in testing the gryps's capabilities.
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the mount researcher again.
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_000<tab>Wh─ Where did you come from!? Get back, quickly!

TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_001<tab>...How odd. Generally speaking, this gryps would sooner gore you than look at you. Did your creator imbue you with a special talent for soothing savage beasts, perchance?
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_002<tab>Curious indeed... I daresay this calls for further experimentation. I don't suppose you would be willing to attempt a flight on its back?

TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_003<tab>I hope that the gryps will find use as a mount, you see─but its aggression toward unfamiliar faces has precluded any real trials thus far. Please, consider it.
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_010<tab>You are willing to ride the gryps? Splendid! We can begin immediately─assuming you have your preferred riding trousers on.
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_Q1_000_011<tab>Are you─and your trousers─ready to ride the gryps?
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_015<tab>The both of you have wonderfully relaxed riding postures. What say you to a little tour of Elpis?
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_020<tab>Noetophoreon's beauty is ever striking. Note the blossoms, which change according to Elpis's seasons and aetherial balance. A true masterwork.
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_021<tab>The gryps seems quite content. A result of the flowers' sweet perfume and your masterful handling, no doubt.

TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_025<tab>These beacons are crucial to our operations here in Elpis─and make convenient lodestars for flying specimens under observation. Successful concepts sight them from a distance, and can approach without hesitation.
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_026<tab>The gryps has passed that test with flying colors, so let us return to solid ground.
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_030<tab>An elegant landing! Another mark in favor of the gryps's utility as a mount.
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_031<tab>I believe I have the data I need. Thank you for your cooperation.
TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_032<tab>I'm sure you are curious as to what today's trial means for our friend here. If you like, we can speak further back at the Wonders.

TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_040<tab>Welcome back. You will be pleased to know that based on these results, I am confident the gryps can be trained to become the perfect mount. It scorns unfamiliar or clumsy hands, yes, but so long as it trusts its rider, it serves <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> incomparably.

TEXT_AKTKZG020_04295_MOUNTOVSERVER04295_000_041<tab>Given Hermes's own expertise, flying creatures are always subject to immense scrutiny before approval. Even so, I have no doubt that our proud friend will pass muster.
